Experience Director Brand Box Entertainment Pvt. Ltd. January 2007  – Present (8 years 8 months) Mumbai Area, India "Every success is built on the ability to do better than good enough." 
 
A brand is often built in a boardroom long before it reaches the markets. Brand Box specializes in providing strategic brand building inputs, taking into account the category momentum, consumer insights and available positions in the consumer's mind, which the brand can occupy and own. 
 
We believe in being partners rather than suppliers to our clients,  
living the process of brand building and offering new strategic inputs or modifying existing ones at each step of the process. 
 
Our Expertise: 
BTL Activities 
Event Conceptualization & Management 
Integrated Marketing Solutions 
Corporate Brand Communications 
Retail Identity Programs 
Trade Channel Solutions 
Media Related Services 
 
The Moto of our organization is Innovation, Ideation & Perfection and our work completely reflects the same. Head - Client Servicing R K Swamy BBDO Group, Hansa Events 2005  –  2007  (2 years) Mumbai Area, India Headed the client servicing in Mumbai, conceptualizing and executing integrated market services, activation and retail programs for clients nationally which would enhance their brand awareness. In-charge of key accounts like ‘HSBC Bank, Raymond, Kodak, Birla Sunlife Insurance, Piaggio, Palmolive, VISA etc. 
 
Key Achievements: 
• Successfully executed Pan India grooming workshops for Raymond in major corporate's and educational institutions (Management & Engineering colleges). 
• Executed a Maha-Utsav spanning 44 cities and a roadshow covering 130 cities and towns for Piaggio’s three wheeler- Ape’. 
• Planned and executed Pan India basis the first ever HSBC Bank Premier Banking - Go Green Activity. 
• Planned and executed, the first ever music launch event for a Bollywood film, aboard the aircraft carrier, IMS Vikrant, for 1971. Head - Marketing & Event Asapp Media Pvt. Ltd. 2005  –  2005  (less than a year) Mumbai Area, India - Conceptualized & Successfully executed the 1st ever Corporate Award Function, CONSTRUCTION WORLD ANNUAL AWARDS attended by Blue Chip Corporate CEO's & COO's which was covered in NDTV. 
- CW ARCHITECT & BUILDER AWARDS which felicitate the top architects and builders in the country 
- KPMG INFRASTRUCTURE TODAY AWARDS, India's first-ever infrastructure awards, which recognize excellence across infrastructure sectors. Sr. Financial Adviser (HNI) & Event Manager Citigroup 2003  –  2005  (2 years) Mumbai Area, India - Handling a team of 15 Sr. Financial Advisors and under them 125 sales field advisors.  
To create a successful brand stands up for Women's Banking. 
- Handle and manage annual media budgets for customer acquisition through campaigns for BTL, web, radio, direct mail, email marketing. 
- Work closely with Marketing Research team to obtain relevant information, including the development and implementation of the Product initiative.  
- Designing Cross Branding Activities in collaboration with Channel Partners & Retailers.  
- Liaison with Vendors, Retailers for all BTL activities 
- BTL & ATL Planning for all ATL (Promotions, Radio, Print Plans & Outdoor) campaigns. 
- Understand the market gaps & customer perspective on all Women Banking products. 
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams from Legal, produce development, compliance and sales for sales campaign management and performance tracking 
 
Key Achievements: 
•	Appreciated as Best Team Manager Woman’s Department – (All India sales). 
•	Appreciated as Best Trainer month on month by Business Manager (Asia Pacific). 
•	Appreciated as Best Event Organized and Managed (Oct – Nov – Dec’03/ May – June’04) by Vice President Woman’s Banking. 
•	Appreciated as “Shooting Star Award” for 2nd and 3rd Quarter. Event Manager Intel Corporation - J.L.Marketing Services Pvt. Ltd. March 1999  –  September 2003  (4 years 7 months) Mumbai Area, India Key Responsibilities 
- Managing Retail Channel Relationship

• Conducted the first ever Roadshow Pan India in India 
• Successfully conceptualized, Executed & Managed many BTL activities for B2C & B2B.

Summary A curse, yet equally a blessing, I see the world "in marketing." Not technicolor. Not numbers. Not in cool little shapes and doodles, but marketing. It's my paintbrush. My language. I was once told, "Toy, I swear. You watch commercials more than you watch the actual show." At the time, I was an aspiring journalist who had no clue that marketing was part of my DNA.  
 
For me, I absolutely get a kick out of helping clients understand the voice of their brand through the voice of their target audience and a thoughtful content/communications strategy. Helping them reach that eureka moment is equivalent to a doctor handing a new mom and dad their baby for the very first time. In marketing, it's at that very moment that a client "gets it" that I can truly build a marketing strategy and content-based framework that helps them truly reach their audience through all the necessary channels. From "tip to tail," I love to outline a solid strategy and execute all the marketing tactics that drive results, while mapping back to the business goal.  
 
If you need a marketer who sees the world in marketing and has a knack for telling a great story, I'm the marketer for you. I'm analytical, research-oriented, customer-centric and deadline driven. At the end of the day, it's key that I work with those who - like me - have a diverse set of skills and share my drive to deliver stellar, memorable work that excites the stakeholder and their intended audience.
